content.content: Hi Sohyun ‚òÜ, I'm sending you my warmest birthday greetings from Colombia. You're also loved and admired in this part of the world ü§ç. I love the lyrics you write and the songs you compose. I truly admire all the work you do and the person you've become since becoming an idol. It truly felt like love at first sight when you were revealed in TripleS, and my love for you only grew as I saw new facets of you. Thank you for recommending such great songs and reading habits. I really find it charming. Also, thank you for being such a good and warm person. I truly admire and love you very much. Happy birthday. ‚ô°
